messages.message:
@Jessica The file submission app requires the user to choose files that are already on the IB filesystem?

Is there any way users can upload files from their local machine through this app?

NatWest are looking to use this as a way for non-technical users to easily submit files that are not already on the IB filesystem and upload them to a workspace.

CC @Aimé

We could add upload capability, but they'd still need to have Instabase accounts - they wouldn't be able to see this page without logging in. If they have Instabase accounts, they could also just take the extra step of uploading the files to their subspace and picking them from there.

I think giving them instabase accounts will be ok. But uploading to a subspace, opening file explorer, clicking to find the correct location then pressing OK is a lot more clicks. And I think this isn't a one-off activity (@Aimé?). The ops team will be doing this a lot @Aimé?
Yeah it will be as and when they get documents through from a third party.
